name: Igniteplate
tagline: Template for all your new applications using Codeigniter
body:
# Igniteplate
[![Project Status](http://stillmaintained.com/aniketpant/igniteplate.png)](https://stillmaintained.com/aniketpant/igniteplate)

## What this is?

A super awesome starter kit for your CI projects.

## What is it made of?

 * Codeigniter
 * PHP (Obviously)
 * Twitter Bootstrap
 * Inuit CSS

## Features

 * 3 column support
 * Menu management
 * User management
 * Sidebar control
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
